supporting_spans: Thalcave whistled in a peculiar manner.
Glenarvan and Thalcave had scarcely time to perceive Robert, who, clinging to the horse's mane, disappeared in the darkness.
contradicting_spans: Thalcave raised him in a mountain mission.
reasoning: Contradiction (factual): The character of Thalcave contradicts the claim that he raised the protagonist in a mountain mission.

analysis.claim_text: Early trauma: at seven his father vanished in a local uprising, at nine his mother died of illness; a banished Jesuit, Father Leclere, raised him in a mountain mission.

sub_claims.text: At seven, his father vanished in a local uprising.
At nine, his mother died of illness.
A banished Jesuit, Father Leclere, raised him in a mountain mission.

analysis.reasoning: Contradiction (factual): The character of Thalcave contradicts the claim that he raised the protagonist in a mountain mission.
